text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, we're already more than five minutes over our ETD. 
Yet there is no sign of Yukino Bijin or Gold City…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
… Is it really necessary for us to travel together? 
We're all headed to the same camp. Why not just meet there?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Well, it might not be necessary per se… but it's more fun together～! Let's all head there as a group!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
The bus ride to the camp is pretty long, so guess what?♪ 
I've got lots planned so we can chat and bond the whole way!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I appreciate your considerations, Curren Chan. Since we're 
collaboratively shaping the Festival of Illustrious Equines, 
I believe it is important that we stand shoulder to shoulder.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Fortunately, we still have a bit of time. 
We can wait another five——

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: I-I'm sorry fer being plumb late!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Yukino and Gold City! There you are～! 
Is everything okay?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Heeh, haah… I-I'm terribly sorry for keeping you held up～! It done took me longer than expected to get ready for the camp…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
No, it's actually my fault! I overslept and Yukino had to come 
all the way to the Ritto dorm to get me, which made us late…

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: No, no, I was already running late when I went to pick you up!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
No really, it's on me. You were at least trying to prepare, 
but I was just oversleeping like an irresponsible dork ——

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Alright, alright, let's end this blame game!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
We have a bus to get onto so let's make our way there! 
Rudolf was just saying how we still have some buffer time, 
so no need to rush♪

text_block_list.name: City and Yukino
text_block_list.text: …… Okay.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Haah… If I were to put it in your words, we're heading into "troubled waters".

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Haha, you think so? 
—— Either way, let's get going.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Camp site touchdown! It just screams traditional 
Japanese style, I love it♪ Ah, Ms. Brian, mind if I 
snap a pic with the inn in the back?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You're so overbearing… as you were on the bus……

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Ahah, maybe I'm a bit too enthusiastic♪ But it's not 
too different from sweet little Maya, so doesn't that 
make you feel more at ease with me, Brian?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …… That's an irritating misconception.

text_block_list.name: Inn Employee
text_block_list.text:
Ah, you must be the group from Tracen Academy! Welcome! 
I hope your journey wasn't too exhausting!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Good afternoon. I am Symboli Rudolf, we spoke on the phone. 
Thank you for accommodating us during our camp.

text_block_list.name: Inn Employee
text_block_list.text:
No problem at all! My granddaughter is also a horsegirl, you see, 
so we're always excited about the Festival of Illustrious Equines. 
If you need anything please don't hesitate to let me know!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for your hospitality. ……Now comrades, let us 
head to our rooms to unpack. Once that is taken care of 
we'll start off with a meeting.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It looks like everyone's ready. 
Let's get down to business then ——

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Our goal here is to hone our skills for the Festival of 
Illustrious Equines. Recognize the roles and responsibilities 
you each have, and endeavor to live up to them.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: First, Narita Brian, you and I will be participating in the Yabusame ceremony.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
This is not a ceremony for the faint of heart. Horsegirls brave 
the crags and cliffs of the sacred mountain, evil-banishing bow 
in hand, shooting arrows at targets symbolic of misfortune.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
At least, so it was. It has been simplified in modern 
times, focusing on simply shooting at targets set up 
in front of the sacred mountain.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Still, mastering the bow is crucial. 
You've had some archery lessons, have you not?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …… I was dragged there with my sister.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hahah, archery is popular among horsegirls, perhaps due to its Yabusame connection.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I too have dabbled in it… but let's aim to 
enhance our skills further on this camp.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
A temporary practice area has been set up for us nearby, 
and all necessary equipment is available. We can begin 
training this afternoon… does that work for you, Brian?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
… I've about had it with the Empress' yelling in my ears 
or being lectured by my sister every time I see her.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Sure, I'll join if you want. …But don't think I'll 
keep you company for some drawn out program. 
Once I've regained my touch, I'm out.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: That's perfectly fine. Now, about the Votive Dance ——

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
That's us～! Me, Yukino, and Gold City are gonna 
dance in tribute to the three goddesses, right?♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
To express horsegirls' gratitude with a charming performance! 
"Thank you, three goddesses, for watching over us… "

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: "Charming"……! I-I-I'll give it my best～!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Keep calm, Yukino. ……We'll be having lessons in the community 
center, with an instructor from the URA…… right?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That is correct. URA personnel with firsthand Votive Dance 
experience. They should be arriving this afternoon.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
As used as I am to dance routines for live shows, 
traditional dance is a bit new to me… but I'll make 
sure it's adorably perfect♪

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Good… that concludes our check-in. Dismissed! 
Go and focus on your practice!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: —— Oh, one last thing. An important reminder for everyone.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
A horsegirl's body is her greatest asset. 
Don't push yourselves too hard, and so 
you won't lose track of time ——

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Remember to highlight your practice periods with a highlighter in your schedules!
